adjectives.description: downtrod (comparative more downtrod, superlative most downtrod)

entries.meaning: (archaic or poetic) downtrodden; abused by superior power

verbs.description: downtrod (third-person singular simple present downtrods, present participle downtrodding, simple past downtrod, past participle downtrodden)

entries.meaning: to oppress, suppress, exploit, persecute, step down on; put down; denigrate, subjugate
